title: Beautiful Peacock Painting
description: A stunning acrylic painting on canvas, capturing the ethereal beauty of a distant galaxy. The vibrant colors and intricate details make it a perfect centerpiece for any room. Each brushstroke is filled with passion and a love for the cosmos.
shortDescription: Vibrant acrylic painting of a distant galaxy.

title: P Name Keychain
description: Carry a piece of magic with you with this handmade resin keychain. It features a miniature enchanted forest scene with tiny mushrooms and moss, encapsulated in crystal-clear resin.
shortDescription: Magical resin keychain with a forest scene.

title: Studs Earrings
description: Delicate and elegant, these polymer clay earrings are shaped like lavender blooms. They are lightweight and hand-painted with subtle details, perfect for adding a touch of nature's beauty to your look.
shortDescription: Hand-painted lavender bloom polymer clay earrings.

title: Heart Love Painting
description: Set of four handmade wooden coasters, pyrographed with a design of your choice. Perfect for a personalized gift. Each coaster is sealed to protect against moisture.
shortDescription: Set of 4 custom pyrographed wooden coasters.

title: Oceanic Waves Resin Tray
description: A beautiful decorative tray made with epoxy resin to mimic the ocean waves crashing on a sandy shore. Perfect for holding jewelry, keys, or as a standalone art piece.
shortDescription: Decorative resin tray with realistic ocean waves.

title: Sunrise Mountains Painting
description: A serene landscape painting capturing the first light of dawn hitting a mountain range. The soft pastel colors create a calm and peaceful atmosphere. Painted with high-quality oils on a linen canvas.
shortDescription: Peaceful oil painting of a mountain sunrise.
